Class Balloon

  • java.lang.Object
    • baloons_gui.patrykpawlicki.balloonsgui.Balloon

    BalloonController

    public class Balloon
extends java.lang.Object
implements BalloonController
    Balloon game object class

    • Constructor Detail

      • Balloon

        public Balloon(android.content.Context context,
               BalloonType type,
               int x,
               int y,
               int radius,
               int elapsedTime)
        Constructor for the balloon object.
        Parameters:
        context - - interface which allows access to resources and states
        type - - enum to distinguish regular balloons with balloons with special effects
        x - - object X coordinate used for generating the circle which balloons are based on
        y - - object Y coordinate used for generating the circle which balloons are based on
        radius - - radius of the circle object corresponding to the balloon
        elapsedTime - - elapsed time since the start of the game

    • Method Detail

      • setBalloonColour

        public android.graphics.Bitmap setBalloonColour()
        Class used for randomising and assigning colours to the appropriate balloons
        Returns:
        Balloon object bitmap

      • getCircle

        public Circle getCircle()
        Method which returns the circle object.
        Returns:
        - circle object

      • updatePosition

        public void updatePosition(int speed)
        Method used for updating the balloon position on the screen. Decrements the Y coordinate of the balloon object as well as the corresponding circle.
        Parameters:
        speed - - variable which determines the movement speed of the object on screen

      • randSpeed

        public static int randSpeed(int elapsedTime)
        Method for generating a random movement speed for the balloon object.
        Parameters:
        elapsedTime - - time elapsed since the start of the game
        Returns:
        randomSpeed integer

      • draw

        public void draw(android.graphics.Canvas canvas)
        Draw method for the balloon object. Draws the appropriate bitmap as well as circle object on canvas which is taken as a method parameter.
        Specified by:
        draw in interface BalloonController
        Parameters:
        canvas - - canvas object which the object will be drawn on

      • handleTouchEvent

        public boolean handleTouchEvent(float x,
                                float y)
        Touch event handler for the balloon object. Responsible for detection whether the click event has taken place within the boundaries of the object.
        Parameters:
        x - - X coordinate of the click event
        y - - Y coordinate of the click event
        Returns:
        collision boolean, true if collision within object radius, false otherwise

        public android.graphics.Bitmap getBitmap()
        Getter for the balloon bitmap
        Returns:
        bitmap graphic for the balloon object

        Setter for the balloon bitmap
        Parameters:

      • isPopped

        public boolean isPopped()
        Method to check whether the balloon is popped
        Returns:
        true if balloon is popped, false otherwise

      • setPopped

        public void setPopped(boolean popped)
        Setter for the popped variable of the balloon object
        Parameters:
        popped - - boolean to check if balloon has been popped (popped balloons don't draw on screen)
